info.description: Account Aggregation is a provision for the user to access their accounts from other banks. The Account Aggregation API is associated with a third party provider called Salt Edge. This third party provider fetches the accounts from other banks and provides the data to the microservice.
info.title: Account Aggregation

post.summary: Retrieves the list of available banks in a country based on the country code
post.description: Retrieves the list of available banks in a country based on the country code. The third party provider Salt Edge is leveraged to fetch the list of all the banks in a country.

supportedAccountNaturess.description: Specifies the account natures that the bank supports, such as Loan, Savings, Debit, and so on.

internalBankId.description: Specifies the unique ID of the bank

supportedFetchScopess.description: Specifies the scope of data that the user can fetch. Based on the provided scopes, the application fetches the data accordingly. Some examples for scopes are Accounts and Transactions.

timeZone.description: Specifies the time zone in which the bank is located, such as Europe, North America, and so on

bankName.description: Specifies the name of the bank

isActive.description: Speciifes the status of the operation (Active/Inactive)

supportedAccountTypess.description: Specifies the account types that the bank supports, such as Personal and Business

logoUrl.description: Specifies the URL for the provider logo that may have a placeholder for providers with missing logos

mode.description: Specifies the mode of authorization that is provided by the third-party provider (oauth/web/api/file)

homeUrl.description: Specifies the URL of the main page of the provider

provider.description: Specifies the name of the third-party provider used to fetch the accounts from other banks. For Example, Salt Edge

loginUrl.description: Specifies the point of entrance to the providerâ€™s login page

countryCode.description: Specifies the unique code of the country

providerStatus.description: Specifies the status of the third-party provider (active/inactive)

bankCode.description: Specifies the unique code of the bank
